item.title: Bobby Hebb - Sunny - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Sunny by Bobby Hebb from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A7, A♯maj7, Dm, Dm6, Dm7, Dmadd5, D♯9, Em7, Esus4, F9.

item.title: Bill Withers & Grover Washington Jr. - Just The Two Of Us - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Just The Two Of Us by Bill Withers & Grover Washington Jr. from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, A7, A♯maj7, Cm, Cm7, D13, Dm, Dm7, F7, F♯maj7, G7, G♯maj7.

item.title: Sly and the Family Stone - Everyday People - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Everyday People by Sly and the Family Stone from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, G.

item.title: Sly and the Family Stone - Everyday People - Baritone Ukulele - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Everyday People by Sly and the Family Stone from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, G.

item.title: The Impressions - People get ready - Baritone Ukulele - Key of D - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song People get ready by The Impressions from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Bm, D, Em, F♯m, G.

item.title: The Impressions - People get ready - Key of D - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song People get ready by The Impressions from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Bm, D, Em, F♯m, G.

item.description: Play along video for the song People get ready by The Impressions from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: Am, C, Dm, Em, F.

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Isn't She Lovely - Ukulele Cheats
item.description: Play along video for the song Isn't She Lovely by Stevie Wonder from the channel Ukulele Cheats. Chords used in the song: A, A7, A♯maj7, C7, Dm7, F, G7.

item.description: Play along video for the song Crazy by Gnarls Barkley from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, Cmaj7, E7, F.

item.title: Jackie Wilson - Higher And Higher - Key of D - Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club
item.description: Play along video for the song Higher And Higher by Jackie Wilson from the channel Ukulaliens - Ukulele Club. Chords used in the song: D, G, G6.
